analysis.description:
Reentrancy in WelCoinCrowdsale.finaliseCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/7/0x697b2658eb4085445625d6aeece29bd117c58c62.sol):
	External calls:
	- totalSupply = token.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/7/0x697b2658eb4085445625d6aeece29bd117c58c62.sol)
	- token.mint(tokenWallet,minterBenefit) (/unique_chucks/7/0x697b2658eb4085445625d6aeece29bd117c58c62.sol)
	- vault.close() (/unique_chucks/7/0x697b2658eb4085445625d6aeece29bd117c58c62.sol)
	- vault.enableRefunds() (/unique_chucks/7/0x697b2658eb4085445625d6aeece29bd117c58c62.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/7/0x697b2658eb4085445625d6aeece29bd117c58c62.sol)

WelCoinCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/7/0x697b2658eb4085445625d6aeece29bd117c58c62.sol#562-587) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,bonusedTokens) (/unique_chucks/7/0x697b2658eb4085445625d6aeece29bd117c58c62.sol#582-584)

WelCoinCrowdsale.mintTokens (/unique_chucks/7/0x697b2658eb4085445625d6aeece29bd117c58c62.sol#591-611) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,bonusedTokens) (/unique_chucks/7/0x697b2658eb4085445625d6aeece29bd117c58c62.sol#609-610)

WelCoinCrowdsale.finaliseCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/7/0x697b2658eb4085445625d6aeece29bd117c58c62.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(tokenWallet,minterBenefit) (/unique_chucks/7/0x697b2658eb4085445625d6aeece29bd117c58c62.sol)
